She watched them on the computer monitors.  She tuned into the 
listening devices and listened in on the conversation.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:
>  Apocalypse walked into the room where drillbit was. He smiled he 
would make 
> a descent leader but if he made a mistake that may cost him or his 
troops 
> lives he would be removed. He knew the felling was mutual. He 
awaited the 
> announcment.
